whatIs.title: What is
whatIs.text: Guild Wars 2 Armory is an easy way to find, view, and share users, characters, and guilds with your friends on your mobile and PC! Join today and start sharing!

embeds.name: Embeds
embeds.upsell: Guild Wars 2 Armory has a rich embed system that allows for highly customised embeds that can display user and character data in any way you see fit.

login.name: Sign in
login.joinCta: Don't have an account? Join us!

forgotPassword.name: Forgot My Password
forgotPassword.checkEmail: Check your email for your reset token!
forgotPassword.success: Your password has been changed. Go login!

join.name: Join
join.loginCta: Already have an account? Go login!

images.tooBig: Image should be less than 1MB, choose another.
images.wrongType: Image should be PNG or JPEG, choose another.

stats.name: Statistics
stats.refreshNote: Armory statistics are refreshed every thirty minutes.

search.name: Search
search.minlength: Search term should be 3 or more characters :-)
search.nonefound: Nothing was found... Thought you'd find something?
search.joincta: Join and add your gw2 api key(s) first!

users.name: Users
users.primaryToken: This is your primary api key, your user information will be sourced from this.
users.invalidToken: Could not retrieve data from GW2, the api key was probably deleted from the ArenaNet account page.

guilds.name: Guilds
guilds.unclaimed: This guild hasn't been claimed yet, if you're the guild leader add an api key with the guilds permission!

characters.name: Characters
characters.embedCta: This is a character chosen at random. You can get an embed just like this on your website! Click the embed text on any character page.
characters.hidden: Can only be seen by you
characters.embedTooltip: Copy and paste this markup onto your website.

apiKeys.name: Api Keys
apiKeys.noKeysCta: Oh, you have no api keys.. go generate one ..! Make sure you select characters, builds, and pvp permissions :-).

messages.gw2ApiDown: The official GW2 API is experiencing issues, your session may be affected!
messages.notFoundLong: Not Found (or the GW2 API is dead)!
messages.resourceNotFound: Sorry, that doesn't exist. Here's a random character instead!
messages.newBags: Bags now available on character pages! User achievements coming soon.

patreon.cta: Guild Wars 2 Armory needs your help, become a patreon today!
